content: On https://docs.rs/zip/0.5.13/zip/result/type.ZipResult.html I noticed basically every letter is in bold and it doesn't seem to be that's owners' intention.

It looks like it was a bug that has since been fixed. It should be resolved when the next version is published.

For questions about rustdoc, I would suggest the #rustdoc channel. For docs.rs, I would suggest #docs-rs on Discord.
